text: I don't search for a specific type of hat necessarily
Probably classic as opposed to something really unique
I'm more likely to want to stand out, because I
Stand out in a positive way. I don't want to make
a huge statement because I'm not a fashion forward type person.
But I was looking for color. I was looking
for color, and I was looking for classic,
and I felt this fit both of those.
It was one of the best hats I've worn on Derby Day.
I've been, I think, six or seven times when I could wear a hat.
And It was the best. It wasn't too heavy.
One year I had one that leaned to one side, and
it was really tough to balance, and it was uncomfortable.
And this one, I could wear my hair naturally curly
which is something I'm known for because I have very
curly hair. And my daughter has curly hair.
So I felt super comfortable with this hat,
and hopefully I'll find another reason to wear it again.
